definition: to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: Microalgae has the ability to degrade and accumulate organic pollutants.
sentences.chinese: 微藻具有富集和降解有機污染物的能力。

sentences.english: If you use air-fresheners, you're inhaling pollutants.
sentences.chinese: 如果您使用的空氣清新，您就會吸入污染物。

sentences.english: The main pollutant in Dumu reservoir is manganese by environmental monitoring results.
sentences.chinese: 監測顯示，獨木水庫中的主要污染物爲錳。

sentences.english: Grease pollutants do harm vey much to our environment and industrial production.
sentences.chinese: 油類污染物對環境和工業生產危害很大。

sentences.english: But the possibility exists that there are other contaminants that have not yet come to light.
sentences.chinese: 但是可能存在其他的污染物還未暴光。

sentences.english: The move will reduce Beijing's pollutant emissions in the heating season by over 10000 tons annually.
sentences.chinese: 此項措施將使北京採暖季可減排污染物上萬噸。

sentences.english: Light-sensitive molecules in the atmosphere scrub air pollution from the skies at night.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，感光的水分子減少了大氣中的污染物。

sentences.english: I think there’s something going on with some type of environmental contaminant.
sentences.chinese: 我想這和某種類型的環境污染物有關。

sentences.english: The mechanism of pollutant degradation in wastewater by heterogeneous catalytic oxidation is primarily explored.
sentences.chinese: 初步探討了非均相催化氧化降解廢水中的污染物機理。

sentences.english: Over hundred organic pollutants were discovered in every water sample.
sentences.chinese: 在每種水樣品中發現有上百種有機污染物。

sentences.english: And many companies distill their oils to help remove contaminants.
sentences.chinese: 許多公司提取魚油，以幫助去除污染物。

sentences.english: The contaminants included emissions from small factories and crab farms along the shore.
sentences.chinese: 污染物涉及小工廠和湖邊的螃蟹養殖場的排放物。

sentences.english: It has been seeping into groundwater from ­industry for years.
sentences.chinese: 多年來它已經從工業污染物裏滲入到地下水。

sentences.english: These contaminants, I think, are threatening the human food supply.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲，這些污染物正在威脅人類的食物供應。

sentences.english: Before the water can be re-used, these pollutants have to be removed from the water.
sentences.chinese: 在廢水能被回用之前，這些污染物必須從水中除去。

sentences.english: It indicated that air pollution of DCARTS had direct mutagenesis.
sentences.chinese: 提示我們危貨站空氣污染物具有直接遺傳毒性作用。

definition: fine particle (PM 2.5)/fine particulate matter (air pollution etc)
